text:
<@U05DMVDNNNQ> you would beed a direct integration for that…… Maybe you can create an app but I have not tried it yet. I am not sure how open Google is to letting anybody create private apps insight Google.
Or you might be able to use a script. But that is all theoretical as I have not tried it yet.
if you find one <@U05DMVDNNNQ> I am all ears :slightly_smiling_face:
this was a simple solution that did not require any further dev help for my client and could be set up immediately
